- `todo/deadline/event abc` : Adds a To-Do/Deadline/Event named 'abc' into TaskList
- `mark 1` : Marks your first Task as done
- `bye` : Saves Tasks into a file and closes Duke
- `todo run` : Adds a To-Do named 'run' into TaskList
